# Function createSession

  * createSession(  
params: Partial<[Session](../interfaces/Session.html)> & { appName: string; id: string },  
): [Session](../interfaces/Session.html)

Creates a session from a partial session.

#### Parameters

    * params: Partial<[Session](../interfaces/Session.html)> & { appName: string; id: string }

The partial session to create the session from.

#### Returns [Session](../interfaces/Session.html)

The session.
